1.0.name: wordpress/social-share-love
1.0.description:
Social Share Love plugin for WordPress adds a list of XHTML compliant graphic links at the end of your posts or pages that allow your visitors to easily submit them on most important social bookmarking sites. Also, for easy configuration, the Social Share Love plugin adds a page in the WordPress admin section that lets you customize it.

Social Share Love support the following social bookmarking networks: delicious, digg, facebook, friendfeed, google, myster-wong, myspace, reddit, slashdot, stumbleupon, technorati, twitter and yahoo.

We would like to thank the kind and generous folks at pariuri sportive for their donation that allows us to make the Social Share Love wordpress plugin.

If you like this plugin please rate it.
